title: ‘I Didn’t Have the Right Legs’: Wout van Aert, Visma Misfire in Omloop Het Nieuwsblad
content:
Jorgenson upbeat despite missed chance: 'It just wasn’t very selective,' says US star, while Van Aert caught out of position.

Read the full article at ‘I Didn’t Have the Right Legs’: Wout van Aert, Visma Misfire in Omloop Het Nieuwsblad on Velo.
author: sstokes
